articles.title: European shares struggle ahead of U.S. jobs data - Reuters.com
articles.description: European shares opened slightly lower on Friday and struggled to make gains after the shooting of Japan's former prime minister caused a pullback in Asian shares, while investors waited for key U.S. jobs data later in the session.
